title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Organizational Culture Development and Change Management through Storytelling

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more storytelling techniques for conveying an organization’s core values.
Learners can design story structures suitable for organizational change scenarios based on real-world cases.
Learners iteratively improve their storytelling approaches at least twice through peer feedback.
Within four weeks after the course, learners implement a storytelling-based change management program at least once in their affiliated organization.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
